org.matsim.contrib.common.stats

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.contrib.common.stats.Histogram

  • public class Histogram
extends Object
    Utility functions to generate histograms.
    Author:
    illenberger

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Histogram() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap complementary(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
      Calculates the complementary (1 - bin height) of a (normalized) histogram.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createCumulativeHistogram(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
      Creates a cumulative histogram where each bin height is the sum of the previous bin's height and the current bin's height.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(DescriptivePiStatistics stats, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer and weighted with the inverse of the samples' pi-values.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.DescriptiveStatistics stats, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(double[] values, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(double[] values, double[] weights, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer and weighted with the values in weights.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalize(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
      Normalizes a histogram so that the sum of all bin heights equals 1.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalize(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram, double sum)
      Normalizes a histogram so that the sum of all bin heights equals sum.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalizeCumulative(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
      Normalizes a (cumulative) histogram so that the last bin's height equals 1.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalizeCumulative(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram, double sum)
      Normalizes a (cumulative) histogram so that the last bin's height equals sum.
      static double sum(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
      Calculates the sum of all bin heights.

    • Method Detail

      • createHistogram

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.DescriptiveStatistics stats,
                                                                      Discretizer discretizer,
                                                                      boolean reweight)
        Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer. Correctly handles DescriptivePiStatistics objects.
        Parameters:
        stats - a descriptive statistics object
        discretizer - a discretizer
        Returns:
        a double-double map where the key denotes the bin and the value the bin height.

      • createHistogram

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(DescriptivePiStatistics stats,
                                                                      Discretizer discretizer,
                                                                      boolean reweight)
        Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer and weighted with the inverse of the samples' pi-values.
        Parameters:
        stats - a descriptive statistics object
        discretizer - a discretizer
        reweight - if true the bin height is reweighted with (divided by) the bin's width. Use this for discretizers with variable bin width
        Returns:
        a double-double map where the key denotes the bin and the value the bin height.

      • createHistogram

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(double[] values,
                                                                      Discretizer discretizer,
                                                                      boolean reweight)
        Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer.
        Parameters:
        values - the samples
        discretizer - a discretizer
        reweight - if true the bin height is reweighted with (divided by) the bin's width. Use this for discretizers with variable bin width
        Returns:
        a double-double map where the key denotes the bin and the value the bin height.

      • createHistogram

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap createHistogram(double[] values,
                                                                      double[] weights,
                                                                      Discretizer discretizer,
                                                                      boolean reweight)
        Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer and weighted with the values in weights.
        Parameters:
        values - the samples
        weights - the weights
        discretizer - a discretizer
        reweight - if true the bin height is reweighted with (divided by) the bin's width. Use this for discretizers with variable bin width
        Returns:
        a double-double map where the key denotes the bin and the value the bin height.

      • normalize

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalize(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
        Normalizes a histogram so that the sum of all bin heights equals 1.
        Parameters:
        histogram - a histogram
        Returns:
        a normalized histogram.

      • normalize

                                                                double sum)
        Normalizes a histogram so that the sum of all bin heights equals sum.
        Parameters:
        histogram - a histogram
        sum - the sum of all bin heights
        Returns:
        a normalized histogram

      • normalizeCumulative

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalizeCumulative(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
        Normalizes a (cumulative) histogram so that the last bin's height equals 1.
        Parameters:
        histogram - a (cumulative) histogram
        Returns:
        a normalized (cumulative) histogram

      • normalizeCumulative

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap normalizeCumulative(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram,
                                                                          double sum)
        Normalizes a (cumulative) histogram so that the last bin's height equals sum.
        Parameters:
        histogram - a (cumulative) histogram
        sum - the value if the last bin's height
        Returns:
        a normalized (cumulative) histogram

        public static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap complementary(gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap histogram)
